channel.title: Comments for page "Epitaph of the Twilight"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Epitaph of the Twilight"

item.title: no, just...no
item.content:encoded:
it does not match

you could google "epitaph of the twilight" and easily figure out that it's based on .hack, as everything else in r00t is, as everyone has previously pointed out

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
The name could be based on the Visual novel Umineko no naku koro ni. In that visual novel there's the epitaph of the witch in which people go dying as sacrifices during the twilights.

This is it:

http://i153.photobucket.com/albums/s223/TJfarmer/Umineko/Epitaph.jpg

I'm not really certain because 11 doesn't seem to know a lot about the series butâ€¦ it just matchs.
